interpretation.p: Approximate dates described in terms of centuries or partial centuries have been interpreted as documented in Syriaca.org Dates.

category.catDesc: The name used by Syriaca.org for document titles, citation, and disambiguation. These names have been created according to the Syriac.org guidelines for headwords: http://syriaca.org/documentation/headwords.html.
An anglicized version of a name, included to facilitate searching.
Indicates the content is canonical, i.e., widely agreed upon. Abbreviations of work titles are primarily in view.

langUsage.language: Unvocalized Syriac of any variety or period

bibl.title: Luke (Peshitta Version)
ܐܘܢܓܠܝܘܢ ܩܕܝܫܐ ܟܪܘܙܘܬܐ ܕܠܘܩܐ
ܣܦܪܐ ܕܠܘܩܘܣ
Luke
Luke
ܐܶܘܰܓܶܠܺܝܳܘܢ ܩܰܕܺܝܫܳܐ ܣܒܰܪܳܬܐ ܕܠܘܽܩܳܘܣ ܡܣܰܒܪܳܢܳܐ
S. Luke
The Gospel of S. Luke, according to the Peshitta version
The Gospel of Luke, according to the Peshitta version
ܐܘܢܓܠܝܘܢ ܩܕܝܫܐ ܟܪܘܙܘܬܐ ܕܠܘܩܐ ܡܣܒܪܢܐ
ܫܠܡ ܐܘܢܓܠܝܘܢ ܩܕܝܫܐ ܟܪܘܙܘܬܐ ܕܠܘܩܐ ܡܣܒܪܢܐ ܕܡܠܠ ܝܘܢܐܝܬ ܒܐܠܟܣܢܕܪܝܐ ܪܒܬܐ
ܐܘܢܓܠܝܘܢ ܩܕܝܫܐ ܕܝܫܘܥ ܡܫܝܚܐ ܟܪܘܙܘܬܐ ܕܛܘܒܢܐ ܠܘܩܐ ܚܕ ܡܢ ܫܒܥܝܢ ܫܠܝ̈ܚܐ .
ܫܠܡ ܐܘܢܓܠܝܘܢ ܩܕܝܫܐ. ܟܪܘܙܘܬܐ ܕܠܘܩܐ.ܕܡܠܠ ܝܘܢܐܝܬ ܒܐܦܣܘܣ
The Gospel of S. Luke
Luke, according to the Peshitta version
The Gospel of Luke according to the Peshitta version
The Gospel of Luke
New Testament. Luke. Peshitta.
bibl.note: The Gospel of Luke (Peshitta Version) is a designation for a group of texts translating the Greek Gospel of Mark, beginning in the early 5th century and appearing in manuscripts as early as the 5th or 6th century. It bears similarities to previous Syriac translations, the Diatessaron and Luke (Old Syriac), but its exact relationship to these versions is still a matter of debate, as is the uniformity of the text itself. It generally reflects the Greek more closely than Luke (Old Syriac) does.
ܡܛܠ ܕܿܣܓܿܝܐܐ̈ ܨܒܼܘ܃ ܕܿܢܟܼܬܿܒܼܘܼܢ ܬܿܫܥܝܬܼܐ̈ ܕܿܣܘܼܥܪܢܐ̈܂ ܐܝܠܝܢ ܕܿܚܢܢ ܡܦܿܣܝܢ ܚ̱ܢܢ ܒܿܗܘܼܢ܃
ܐܶܘܰܓܶܠܺܝܳܘܢ ܩܰܕܺܝܫܳܐ ܣܒܰܪܳܬܐ ܕܠܘܽܩܳܘܣ ܡܣܰܒܪܳܢܳܐ ܕܡܰܠܶܠ ܘܣܰܒܰܪ ܝܰܘܢܳܐܺܝܬ ܒܰܐܠܶܟܣܰܢܕܪܺܝܰܐ ܪܰܒܬܳܐ܀
